articles.title: A mass extinction event occurred 30M years ago and scientists have only just learned about it - CTV News

articles.title: WHO endorses world’s first malaria vaccine for use in children - The Citizen
articles.description: The WHO recommends that children in sub-Saharan Africa and other regions with moderate to high malaria transmission get four doses up to the age of two.
articles.content:
The World Health Organization has endorsed the RTS,S/AS01 malaria vaccine, the first against the mosquito-borne disease that kills more than 400,000 people a year, mostly African children.
